body.text: Displays a splash screen for some time
This library provides an easy way to display a splash screen. The splash screen is composed of a background picture, title and subtitle.
Let's create a fake image first to showcase the library.
Call the `splash portrait` or `splash landscape` to display the splash screen.
* "My awesome game" is the title; leave it blank if you don't need it
* "Ready..." is the subtitle; leave it blank if you don't need it
* 3 is the duration of the splash in seconds.
Use the `splash landscape` action if your game is expected to be played in landscape.
Displays a splash screen for some time

Fg2CamQ62xUJtz1AAC9F1tAt.text: Call `splash` to display the splash screen.

PVQY3RZ3oRabq6dPECcWne9O.text: * `start` is the code that runs when the user press start. A new page is already pushed on the stack.

LCoyDStgxO1UDPjVHu7o5vNn.text: Applies the splash background color or picture to the current page.
